page.title: 04Wild Flowers in Lathom
page.content: We think that there are probably far fewer wild flowers today than there were 50 years ago in Lathom. We think the wild flower population is decreasing because of:- 1) Pollution from more cars. 2) Fewer hedgerows. 3) Increased spraying of cropss. 4) More picking\damaging of wild flowers. We collected 45 different specimens of wild flowers round our school. Then we asked an older resident who knows about wild flowers and she did not agree. She thinks there are just as many now as 50 yrs. ago. Children now travel in cars so do not see them and don't know their names. She walked 9km each day and saw many wild flowers. She had also made a list of flowers found in Lathom this year. We put our two lists together and came up with more than 70 varieties.
